thread.title: Gloria Meloche
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Gloria Meloche

author: Gloria Meloche
title: Gloria Meloche
text:
Just wasting time until my husbands car was done at the dealership. We walked in and everyone was great. We were just going to look around, when I asked my husband didn't you always want a recliner? Well before we knew it the lady that took care of us gave a deal we couldn't pass up.
We got the 2 seater recliner / black leather. What a day, we are so impressed with our new furniture.
Thank you so very much...
